Title: Windbreaker City
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Gabe Liedman, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Matt O'Brien (executive story editor), Brigitte Liebowitz (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake is heartbroken over Sophia, but his spirits are lifted when the squad is invited to a Homeland Security terrorist training simulation.
